faqs.question: What do I get today?
faqs.answer: Browser Automation Studio: visual workflow builder, CI-friendly tests, replay viewer, and MP4 exports (watermark rules by plan).

faqs.question: What is coming next?
faqs.answer: UX metrics layer (friction, duration, spatial paths) and agent loops that fix flows via ecosystem-manager + PRD control tower.

faqs.question: Do I have to talk to sales?
faqs.answer: No. No sales calls, no per-seat pricing. Subscribe, download, and grow quietly. Support is async.

faqs.question: Can I cancel or switch?
faqs.answer: Yes. Plans are flat, cancellable, and your price is honored as the suite expands.
